name: Chevrolet

chargingStrategy.nacsAdoptionTimeline: Native NACS starting with 2026 models (Equinox EV, Blazer EV, Silverado EV)

networkPartnerships: Free NACS adapter program for 2024-2025 CCS1 models
Partnership with EVgo for public charging

content.description: Chevrolet is bringing affordable electric vehicles to market with the Equinox EV starting around $35,000. Built on GM's Ultium platform, Chevy EVs offer competitive range, fast charging, and available Super Cruise hands-free driving technology.
content.evStrategySummary: GM's mainstream brand focusing on affordable EVs for mass market adoption. Equinox EV targets budget-conscious buyers while Blazer EV and Silverado EV serve performance and truck markets. All-electric future with Ultium platform enabling multiple body styles and price points.
